definition: an examiner/an official conducting an exam
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father

sentences.english: This is your chance to show off to the people interviewing you.
sentences.chinese: 这可是你向面试考官展现你自己的好时机。

sentences.english: When you go into the interview, speak clearly so you can be heard.
sentences.chinese: 口试时要口齿清晰让考官和搭档能够听清你的话。

sentences.english: Don't ask the examiner if what you say is correct。
sentences.chinese: 不要询问考官你回答的是否正确误。

sentences.english: The examiner asked me a lot of difficult questions.
sentences.chinese: 考官问了我许多有难度的问题。

sentences.english: First of all , think about how you can make your best impression on the interviewers.
sentences.chinese: 首先，想想如何才能给主考官留下最佳印象。
这个主考官看上去很严肃。

sentences.english: I tried to predict the interviewers＇ questions and how I should give my answers.
sentences.chinese: 我试图猜测考官会问些什么问题，我又如何回答。

sentences.english: He satisfied the examiner in his examination.
sentences.chinese: 他的考试成绩使主考官感到满意。

sentences.english: Please inform an invigilator as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 请立即通知考场内的考官。

sentences.english: The Summary of Contributions will be much sought and carefully read by the examiners.
sentences.chinese: 主考官讲话对成果的总结做更多的和更仔细的阅读。

sentences.english: The boys were summoned in turn to see the examiner.
sentences.chinese: 男孩子们依次被召入见考官。

sentences.english: Examiners Well, Hello, everybody, let me introduce myself.
sentences.chinese: 主考官好，大家好，让我来介绍一下我自己。

sentences.english: Talk to an Examiner , ask if you can be examined, and she'll give you can Unstamped Letter.
sentences.chinese: 谈一个考官问，如果你可以检查，她会给您可以印信。

sentences.english: The examiner leads the test-taker through various parts.
sentences.chinese: 考官引导考生进行各个环节的测试。

sentences.english: All the examinees are allowed to come into the room, in turn, to be interviewed by the examiner.
sentences.chinese: 所有的考试人员依次进入房间，接受主考官的面试。

sentences.english: In addition, some of the tasks are scored by two raters in order to check the reliability of the ratings.
sentences.chinese: 而且个别题目还会为了公正起见，由两名考官评分。

definition: exam candidate/student whose name has been put forward for an exam
to draw up the theme (for discussion)
to correct student papers/to grade exam papers
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
